home.title: Welcome to my portfolio site!
home.intro: Here you can explore my work, studies and projects.
home.mydes: A control, automation, and robotics systems and szoftvere engineer.
home.mydes1: Discover my professional journey, academic achievements, and highlights from my past projects.
